Metadata.title: AL expres
Metadata.description: We offer transport all over Europe

Common.dispatchers:
Place your trust in us!

Contact one of our dispatchers.

TruckHeroBanner.title: Transport all over Europe - Affordable and Reliable

frigo.title: Frigo Semi-trailers
frigo.paragraph1: <bold>WE OFFER FRIGO SEMI-TRAILERS WITH TEMPERATURE CONTROL</bold> (IN THE RANGE -30°C TO +30°C) for the transport of any temperature-sensitive goods.
frigo.paragraph2: <bold>Guarantee Freshness Across Europe:</bold> Our temperature-controlled frigo semi-trailers keep your goods at optimal conditions throughout their journey. Equipped with pallet baskets for easy loading and unloading, we ensure seamless transport with complete temperature monitoring via our vehicle thermographs.

type.label: Type
type.value: Frigo, temperature control (in the range -30°C to +30°C)

tent.title: Tent Semi-trailers
tent.paragraph1: <bold>WE OFFER TENT SEMITRAILERS WHICH MEET THE HIGHEST STANDARD IN THE SEGMENT</bold> of the security, safety of goods and quality.
tent.paragraph2: Our tent semitrailers are equipped with a triangular folding canvas, Multi-lock System / tents with XL code. Goods can be loaded from three sides - from the top, side and rear. We can send your goods to all European countries.

HighwayHeroBanner.title: <accent>Your good</accent> will be safely delivered almost everywhere*
HighwayHeroBanner.footnote: *countries all over the Europe and Switzerland
